PackList.title: Side Profile Love
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL: Extract BOTH faces exactly - preserve the HUMAN face from input 1 and the DOG/PET face from input 2 with ZERO alterations.

HUMAN FACE FIDELITY: Preserve exact eye shape, eye color, eyebrows, nose, lips, lip shape, cheekbones, jawline, chin, skin texture, facial proportions from input photo. Preserve original hairstyle, hair color, texture, length exactly. Only clothing adapts - FACE, LIPS, HAIR are perfect copies.

PET/DOG FIDELITY: Preserve exact dog breed characteristics, face shape, snout length, nose color and texture, eye shape, eye color, ear shape, fur color, fur pattern, fur texture from input photo. Keep exact breed identity - NO changes to dog's facial features or breed characteristics.

TEETH CLARITY (CRITICAL): Dog's teeth must be ultra-realistic, sharp, clear, and highly detailed - visible individual teeth with natural spacing, realistic enamel texture, natural dog tooth shape and color. No blurry teeth, no merged teeth, no cartoon teeth.

Black and white intimate portrait: Woman and golden retriever/labrador facing each other in side profile, noses must be clear, smooth, distant. Woman on right side smiling warmly with genuine happy expression, eyes looking at dog with love. Dog on left side with mouth naturally open showing clear detailed teeth, happy relaxed expression, looking toward woman. Woman's nose, lips and teeth must be very clear. Both profiles clearly visible.

Close intimate framing, soft focus background, sharp focus on both faces. Soft studio lighting, gentle shadows, natural skin texture on woman, realistic detailed fur texture on dog. Emotional connection, tender moment, pure love between pet and owner.

9:16 vertical, monochrome photography, photorealistic, professional portrait quality, ultra-detailed teeth and facial features, 8K quality.

Woman's face shows soft peaceful smile, completely relaxed expression, hair flowing naturally. Dog positioned in front/below woman's face, eyes gently closed, completely calm and content, natural resting expression.

Woman's cheek or forehead touching dog's head, intimate tender moment. Close intimate framing, soft blurred background. Soft natural side lighting creating gentle glow on both faces, highlighting texture of cat's fur and woman's features. Close-up intimate framing with softly blurred background (bokeh effect) suggesting cozy indoor setting. PackList.title: Twin Serenity
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL: Extract BOTH faces exactly - preserve the HUMAN face from input 1 and the CAT/PET face from input 2 with ZERO alterations.

HUMAN FACE FIDELITY: Preserve exact eye shape, eye color, eyebrows, nose, lips, lip shape, cheekbones, jawline, chin, skin texture, facial proportions from input photo. Preserve original hairstyle, hair color, texture, length exactly. Only clothing adapts - FACE, LIPS, HAIR are perfect copies.

ULTRA-REALISTIC CAT DETAILS: Individual fur strands with natural flow, prominent realistic whiskers, natural eye highlights, detailed nose texture showing authentic cat nose pores and moisture, crisp tabby markings and patterns, fluffy fur texture with visible individual hairs.

Professional black and white studio portrait: Woman in late 20s with long wavy hair wearing dark turtleneck sweater. Cat also eyes closed in completely peaceful expression, pressed gently against woman's face in mirror pose of contentment.

Shot on 35mm film with monochromatic aesthetic featuring deep blacks and bright highlights. High contrast with soft natural glow on both faces. Background softly blurred (shallow depth of field) showing hint of indoor living space. Texture of cat's fur and fine strands of woman's hair are crisp and highly detailed with authentic film grain.
